Sup guys, first post!

I love the Kethane mod, and in particular the scanning aspect of it and that of others such as ISA mapsat and S.C.A.N sat. However as of the later Kethane updates the scanning interface was changed to the new hex map system displayed over the entire planet on map view. I swear I'm literally the only person playing ksp who wasn't a massive fan? I mean I know the original 1 pixel scan width was ridiculous, but I still preferred the UI window :/

ANYWAY to the point... I was hoping someone might be able to inform me of or advise me how to get the original scanning UI window back in the 0.9 kethane mod for ksp 0.22! (or a better version somehow)

Why:

I'd like to do all my scanning from one view.

I'm one for realism and tech'y stuff including my interfaces.

I'm slightly OCD about my scanning windows and UI.

I think the map view shouldn't have to be switched to for viewing scanning progress unlike any other scanning mods.

Thanks for reading! Let me know what you think or if you know of anything!

P.S. sorry if this is in the wrong place; it be my first post
